title: Til There Was You
features: During the time when women were rarely given the same opportunities as men, free-spirited Cassandra Rose Harrington was accepted as a full member of the Toronto Symphony Orchestra as a violinist. After her first adult lesbian experience, Cassandra discovered her heart was not in it because of her deep emotions for her best friend, Elizabeth Crawley.

Cassandra is afraid to tell Elizabeth her true feelings for fear of losing her friendship. Ms. Crawley, a very closeted lesbian, has the same feelings for Cassandra, but keep them inside because she doesn't want to ruin their wonderful friendship. Finally, she visits Cassandra while the orchestra is in the city of lights, romantic Paris, France, determined to reveal her secret.
Plenty of romance, passion and thrills to please all readers.
description: V. McConaughy of Ohio, is the published author of several lesbian romance novels, including, The Hope Chest and The Chair. She lives in Ohio with her cats, Gabby, a television celebrity and total nut, and Alexus, her serious child. She is involved in many charitable organizations as well as Scottish and Irish heritage groups.
